name: The Adventures of Clive McMulligan on Planet Zeta Four
description: Clive McMulligan is a 2D retro-inspired action/puzzle/platformer with challenging old school style gameplay. Over 70 levels with fast-paced gravity switching mechanics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 410 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 410 MB available space
